title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Agentic AIOps: How LogicMonitor Prepares Enterprises for AI-Driven IT (AIM232)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 代理式AIOps：LogicMonitor如何为企业准备AI驱动的IT运维 (AIM232)
abstract: Agentic AI is transforming enterprise IT, enabling systems that act autonomously, learn continuously, and drive faster, smarter decisions. Yet this new power introduces complexity. In this session, leaders from LogicMonitor, NTT, and WWT unpack what Agentic AI means for today’s IT organizations and how leaders can prepare. We’ll discuss how to evaluate your organization’s Agentic AIOps maturity, identify the right AI partners, and balance oversight with autonomy. Join us to explore what sets Agentic AIOps apart, how to assess readiness, and real-world case studies in production. This presentation is brought to you by LogicMonitor, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 代理式AI正在改变企业IT，使系统能够自主行动、持续学习并推动更快、更智能的决策。然而，这种新力量带来了复杂性。在本次会议中，来自LogicMonitor、NTT和WWT的领导者将解析代理式AI对当今IT组织的意义以及领导者如何做好准备。我们将讨论如何评估您组织的代理式AIOps成熟度，识别合适的AI合作伙伴，以及平衡监督与自主性。加入我们，探索代理式AIOps的独特之处、如何评估准备情况以及生产环境中的真实案例研究。本演示由AWS合作伙伴LogicMonitor提供支持。
